chapters.title: Chapter 15: A Different Skill
chapters.info: Monaelle, p. 346—Short Wise One (shorter than Elayne) with red-streaked yellow hair to her waist and a mild, motherly face. She is weaker in the One Power than almost all Aes Sedai. She is the mother of seven, and served as the midwife at Elayne and Aviendha's Rebirth as first-sisters.
